body_html:
Hello, I'd love to contribute by working on an implementation of this. I'm considering the in-place radix k-select, pivot to cut problem size, then sort, or perhaps a full sort if that turns out to be quicker.

@lagoon0o0, do you have a history of runtimes for certain size/shape tensors for this algorithm you'd like to see improvement on?

I'm fairly new to TensorFlow, and would appreciate some insight into the shapes that tensors take in production applications. Thanks!
